title: Your clothing can burn
creator_credit: Alfred Higgins and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Demonstrates the correct as well as incorrect procedures for dealing with clothing whenit is ignited. Uses laboratory experiments to show the importance of selecting clothing and fabrics that resist fire.
